featured.text: The soybean is free of cholesterol, and more importantly, the soy oil contains some special substances, called Omega 3 fatty acids, which reduce cholesterol and prevent blood from clotting in human body.

definition.zh_def: 含有大量脂肪的，肥胖的
definition.en_def: Having a lot of fat; overweight.
definition.example: The steak was too fatty for my taste.
